name: [ARCHIVE] One Night in Dark
description:
Will you be able to survive this night?

Play ONiD with your friends!
The team of Survivors must survive this night, beware of the monsters from the opposite team. Their goal is to destroy all the survivors.

The game was in active development, but was canceled due to unfulfilled expectations. At the moment I am working on a new game "Among Space". Approximate release date: SUMMER 2022

Archive (2022.05.04)
